name: A Bit of Banshee Online Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Sean's daughter goes by the codename Siryn.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Theresa Cassidy goes by the name Siryn. Her powers, flight and a "sonic scream" that harms auditory systems, are the same as her father's.

questions.text: Which government agency did Banshee work for?
questions.explanation:
Interpol.

	Sean Cassidy was an agent for Interpol in his youth, and he was on a mission for Interpol when his wife Maeve gave birth to his daughter, Theresa Cassidy.

Mystique.

	Mystique is Raven Darkholme, a shapeshifting mutant who has served with Magneto time and time again. She has also, at times, been an ally to the X-Men.

options: He was killed in a nuclear explosion.
questions.explanation:
In an airplane crash.

	Shortly after he recovered from his slit throat, Banshee tried to stop a runaway airplane in mid-air with his sonic scream. He wasn't back to full power yet, and his scream had no effect. He died along with everybody onboard.

questions.text: Banshee was romantically involved with Moira MacTaggert. How did she die?
questions.explanation:
She died in an explosion.

	Moira MacTaggert ran a research facility on Muir Island, where Banshee once made his home. A normal human, she was killed when Mystique sabotaged the place. She clung to life, greatly injured, but later gave in.

Tom Cassidy.

	"Black" Tom Cassidy is an evil mutant and Sean's cousin. Partnering up with the Juggernaut, he has caused the X-Men trouble countless times.

questions.text: Cassidy tracked down a serial killer named Arkady. Which villain would he later become?
questions.explanation:
Omega Red.

	Omega Red is a deadly villain created by a covert organization. Able to drain the life-force of others, he has clashed with Wolverine many times over the years.

questions.text: Banshee tried to help Emma Frost when she was abducted by Dark Beast.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Emma made all members involved in the fray forget about it, including Cassidy. He was working with the NYPD at that point, and investigating Harry Leland.

questions.text: Who ruined one of Sean's last jobs with Interpol?
questions.explanation:
Deadpool.

	The mercenary known as Deadpool killed the target of a long-prepared operation, who was to be taken alive. Cassidy took the fall for this and quit Interpol.

questions.text: When the X-Men were abducted and replaced by the alien race known as the Phalanx, Banshee teamed up with some unlikely allies to save them. Who was NOT a member of this makeshift team?
questions.explanation:
Deadpool.

	A young mutant named Blink seemingly defeated the Phalanx, but was herself affected by her mutant power. Shortly afterward, Cassidy and Emma Frost were appointed headmasters at a new school for young mutants.
